entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
